item.title: Black Mesa Playthrough
item.dc:creator: sec4ndh2ndsm0ke
item.description:
Sorry im lazy. i’m not up to watching every playthrough. i was wondering if you had the achievements in there and wanted to compile some how to guides on some of the harder achievements for bm :s . like dead reckoning. like the soda machine ones are easy the headcrabs are easy but just tedious. but the alt. route in office complex,where to drown yourself in lambda core coolant. how to kill a marine with their own grenade, Hidden hat, .357 an assassin… you know just some gameplay footage of us doing the not so obvious achievements.

Read full topic
